EmailTemplate.subject: A PGi gift awaits you at Forrester's Forum
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PGi, the Meetings Experts
{!Lead.FirstName},
As a valued PGi customer, I'd like to personally invite you to visit us at this year’s Forrester's Forum for CIO, EA, Infrastructure & Ops, Security and Risk, And Sourcing Professionals at the Washington Marriot Wardman Park in Washington D.C. on May 6-7, 2013. Be sure to stop by Booth 307 for a special gift and to check out what's new with iMeet and GlobalMeet on-site demos.
And be sure to listen to Joe Yang, PGi’s Senior Director of Solutions Engineering, speak about groundbreaking new communication and collaboration trends for enterprises in his presentation Driving Business Transformation with Integrated Collaboration at the Forum.
Looking forward to seeing you there!
